tool_description: Trains machine learning models for search result ranking using extracted features and labeled training data.

training_features.description: JSON string containing training feature matrix

training_labels.description: Training labels indicating ranking relevance or click-through rates

model_type.description: Type of ranking model to train

validation_split.description: Fraction of data to use for validation (0.1-0.5)

early_stopping.description: Whether to use early stopping to prevent overfitting

error_messages: Invalid training features: Provide valid JSON string containing feature matrix.
Insufficient training data: Need at least 10 training samples.
Feature-label mismatch: Number of feature rows must match number of labels.
Unsupported model type: Use one of [linear, gradient_boosting, neural_network, learning_to_rank].
Invalid validation split: validation_split must be between 0.1 and 0.5.
Invalid learning rate: learning_rate must be between 0.0001 and 1.0.
Invalid iterations: max_iterations must be between 10 and 10000.
Invalid regularization: regularization must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
Training failed: Model training encountered an error during optimization.
usage: Provide training_features matrix and training_labels, specify model_type, and configure hyperparameters like learning_rate, max_iterations, and regularization to train a ranking model.

model_id.description: Unique identifier for the trained model

training_time_seconds.description: Total time spent training the model

model_size_mb.description: Size of the trained model in megabytes

feature_importance.description: Importance scores for each input feature
